## Summary
Fixes CI workflow failure in docker-build-test job by adding `load: true` to the Docker build step.

## Problem
The CI workflow was failing with error:
```
Unable to find image ''melm-dash:test'' locally
docker: Error response from daemon: pull access denied for melm-dash
```

This occurred because `docker/build-push-action@v6` with `push: false` builds the image but doesn''t automatically load it into the local Docker daemon. The subsequent `docker run` test step couldn''t find the image.

## Solution
Added `load: true` parameter to the Build Docker image step in `.github/workflows/ci.yml`. This ensures the built image is loaded into the local Docker daemon, making it available for the container start test.

## Changes
- [.github/workflows/ci.yml](.github/workflows/ci.yml#L155): Added `load: true` to docker-build-test job

## Testing
- Previous commit (bb5c17a) fixed the TypeScript compilation issues with physicalCores
- This commit should allow the docker-build-test job to complete successfully
- CI will validate the fix automatically upon PR creation

## Related
- Part of v1.0.0 Docker build fix roadmap
- Follows up on commit bb5c17a "update docker image workflow"
